mapper.select: select meet_num from meeting m where m.meet_gatherStart <= #{param1} and m.meet_gatherEnd >= #{param1} and m.meet_state != 2 and meet_state != 1
select meet_num from meeting m where m.meet_gatherEnd <= #{param1} and m.meet_end >= #{param1} and m.meet_state != 2 and meet_state !=3
select meet_num from meeting m where date_add(m.meet_end, interval 3 day) <= #{param1} and m.meet_state != 2 and meet_state !=4

select meet_region, meet_interest, meet_thum, meet_subject,meet_point,meet_start,meet_end from meeting where 1=1
and meet_interest in
0,1,2,3,4,5,6
#{arr}
and meet_region in
0,1,2,3,4,5,6,7
#{arr}
and meet_point = 0
and meet_point >0
and meet_subject LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
order by meet_date and meet_start desc

select m.meet_subject, m.meet_gatherStart, m.meet_gatherEnd, m.meet_start, m.meet_end, m.meet_content, m.meet_totalPrs, (select count(app_num) from applicant where meet_num =m.meet_num), m.meet_point, m.meet_region, m.meet_interest, m.meet_thum from meeting m where meet_num = #{param1};
select meet_thum from meeting where meet_num = #{param1}
select count(app_num) from applicant where meet_num = #{param1} and app_state=1
select sum(pt_count) from point where mem_id = 'csj1017'
SELECT COUNT(meet_num) FROM meeting WHERE mem_id= #{mem_id}

select m.meet_subject, m.meet_start, m.meet_end, m.meet_region, m.meet_totalPrs, m.meet_state, m.meet_thum, m.meet_thum, m.meet_num, m.mem_id, (select count(a.app_num) from applicant a where a.meet_num=m.meet_num and a.app_state=1) as app_prs, (select count(a.app_num) from applicant a where a.meet_num=m.meet_num and a.app_confirm=1) as app_chkprs, (select count(g.mem_id) from grade g where g.grd_targetId = #{param3}) as grd_chk from meeting m where mem_id= #{param3} ORDER BY m.meet_state asc,m.meet_num DESC LIMIT #{param1} OFFSET #{param2}
select AVG(g.grd_score) from grade g where g.grd_targetId = #{param1}
